text.content: Drinks will be served as guests arrive.

text.content: Once seated, lunch will begin. After the first course, each honouree will be introduced and celebrated with a short tribute. Lunch will continue between honours, allowing space for conversation and connection.

text.content: Following lunch, guests will be invited to stay on for music, drinks and a relaxed celebration. A chance to unwind and enjoy the evening in good company.
